guideStr:
Help


Not logged in

If you are not logged in. Your notes will be automatically saved in your browser on the unit that you are using.


Logged in

If you log in with your google credentials. Your notes will be saved in cloud and you share the same notes with all logged in units.


You can safely close your browser when the circle in the top right of the text editor toolbar is green. When this indicator is red, your notes are currently being saved.


Toggle dark mode

Toggle between dark mode and light mode by clicking on the sun / moon toggle button in the top right.
